summary: Tower of Dovahkiin is a players home near by Riverwood. The two towers can be seen from a far distance. The location can be found on the world map and reached by fast travelling.
descriptionHtml:
Tower of Dovahkiin 1.0

 Mod by:  Asmodina

 Date:    21 January 2018

  Version 1.0 Initial release

 =========================================================================================
 =========================================================================================

 Tower of Dovahkiin is a players home near by Riverwood. The two towers can be seen from
 a far distance. The location can be found on the world map and reached by fast travelling.

 =========================================================================================
 =========================================================================================

 Installed Files and Folders in the Skyrim Data Folder:

 TowerOfDovahkiin-1_0.esp
 meshes\Terrain\Tamriel\Objects\Tamriel.4.4.-8.BTO

 =========================================================================================
 =========================================================================================

 Installation:

 1. Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) -> [u]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/modmanager/[/u]

    - Download the zip file "TowerOfDDovahkiin_1_0.7z".
    - Start NMM and open the Mods tab.
    - Left click on "Add Mod from File" and select the downloaded zip file.
    - Then select the entry "TowerOfDDovahkiin_1_0" in the list.
    - Left click on "Activates the selected mod" or activating via double-click.
    - Check if the ESP file is activated in the Tab Plugins.

    Note: If you are asked to overwrite a folder it is okay to choose yes. This will merge
    the two folders together and place the files an folders into the correct file path.
    The file path should look like above under "Default Installation Path" above.

 2. Manually Installation

    - Download and extract the zip file "TowerOfDDovahkiin_1_0.7z".
    - Copy the file "TowerOfDovahkiin-1_0.esp" into the Skyrim Data folder.
    - Copy the content of the Data folder into the Skirym Data folder.
    - Start the Skyrim Launcher and activate the ESP file under Data Files.

 =========================================================================================
 =========================================================================================

 Uninstall:

 1. Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)

    - Start NMM and open the Mods tab.
    - Right click on "TowerOfDDovahkiin_1_0" in the list.
    - For unistall choose "Uninstall or Delete -> Delete mod (permanently) and uninstall".

 2. Manually Uninstall

     For a manually uninstall delete the following files in the Skyrim Data Folder:

     - TowerOfDovahkiin-1_0.esp
     - meshes\Terrain\Tamriel\Objects\Tamriel.4.4.-8.BTO

 =========================================================================================
 =========================================================================================
author: Asmodina
